verbose_text: IpaH9.8, a Shigella flexneri effector, is a NEL-type E3 ubiquitin ligase that promotes polyubiquitination and the subsequent proteasome dependent degradation of the NFkappaB essential modifier (NEMO), which influences NFkappaB activation.
evidence: E3 ubiquitin ligase                             that promotes polyubiquitination and the subsequent proteasome-dependent degradation of the NFkappaB essential modifier (NEMO
